ComicInfo.Summary:
The hit list grows as more members of the Brown House Bishops fall to a mysterious crew of assassins. But a monkey wrench is thrown into the mix as Rian continues to play with fire. The acclaimed, heart-pounding, fast-paced action/thriller series from Zenescope Entertainment continues!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creators | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Drew Edward Johson & Wes Hartman | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Oracle | 3 | Zenescope | Zenescope Exclusive Cover, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | 4 | WWA | Wizard World Austin Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | Jamie Tyndall & Ula Mos | 5 | Digital | Digital Edition | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 6 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-02 18:19:45. [CVDB431495]
